Class LogoutController

java.lang.Object
uk.aiapplied.scotaccountclient.LogoutController
@Controller public class LogoutController extends Object
Controller that handles user logout operations.

This controller is responsible for safely logging users out of both the application and the ScotAccount identity provider by implementing OpenID Connect RP-initiated logout.

    • LogoutController

      public LogoutController()
      Default constructor for LogoutController.

      This constructor is used by Spring's dependency injection to create the controller bean. Configuration values are injected through @Value annotations.

  • Method Details

    • logout

      @GetMapping("/logout") public String logout(jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Handles user logout requests.

      This method:

      1. Extracts the user's ID token from the authentication context
      2. Constructs a logout URL for the ScotAccount OIDC provider
      3. Includes the ID token hint and post-logout redirect URI
      4. Redirects the user to the ScotAccount logout endpoint

      If the user is not authenticated, they are redirected to the home page.

      Parameters:
      request - the HTTP request
      response - the HTTP response
      authentication - the current authentication context
      Returns:
      a redirect to either the ScotAccount logout URL or the home page
